modName: Dragonborn Unleashed - Blood and Berserker Powers
summary:
Blood Omen and Leech essence designed for vampire players, berserk and Fire Aegis designed for those who aren't. Any character can use any spell however. Fire Aegis is to take the place of mist form for vampires, and berserker to fill the role of Blood Omen.

These abilites are OP'd for normal vanilla game, but very helpful
descriptionHtml:
Massive thanks to Mojo22 @ Bethesda Forums, he provided me the scripts I needed to make some of these spells possible and was
very patient with me learning.

Blood Omen and Leech essence designed for vampire players, berserk and Fire Aegis designed for those who aren't. Any character can use any spell however. Fire Aegis is to take the place of mist form for vampires, and berserker to fill the role of Blood Omen.

These abilites are OP'd for normal vanilla game, but very helpful and fun to those running mods to make enemies stronger.




The Powers

Blood Omen : A Blood frenzy that boosts all damage and speed fueled by your Magicka.
Effects:

- The ability can be toggled and will dispel when you run out of magicka
- Attack damage increased by 30%
- Spell damage increased by 70%
- Spells cost 60% less to cast
- Magicka depletes constantly while this ability is active
- You can waterwalk while this is active
- Your weaponspeed is 20% faster while this ability is active
- Your runspeed is 20% faster while this ability is active
- Your health regenerates 300% faster while active
- Stamina is fortified 300 points
- Bat cloak effect: Bats do damage to enemies and heal you for damage done
- Bats will feed on recently killed enemies nearby
- Effect dispels when you run out of magicka


Leech Essence: Use the vampire Lords drain spell anytime.

- It's the Vampire Lords life drain. More of a focus on health restore than damage but still pretty potent. AOE effect intact, removed it's ability to level up VLord perks. ( gets buggy and can cause problems, better this way )

Berserker
same as blood omen but loses the bats in place of a fire effect for those not going the vampire route

- this ability can be toggled on and off
- Attack damage increased by 30%
- Spell damage increased by 70%
- Spells cost 20% MORE to cast
- Magicka depletes constantly while this ability is active(slower than Blood Omen)
- You can waterwalk while this is active
- Your weaponspeed is 20% faster while this ability is active
- Your runspeed is 20% faster while this ability is active
- Your health regenerates 300% faster while active
- Stamina is fortified 300 points
- Fire Cloak Effect: Fire damage to enemies
- Effect dispels when you run out of magicka


Fire Aegis
-Massive damage resistance to physical and magical attacks
-Immune to fall damage
-Very rapidly drains Magicka while active
-Can be toggled, can be used even in ragdoll animation
*designed to be used in desperate situations when you can't use other abilities, ie. Dragon knock down or just hit by unrelenting force and enemies are about to pummel you before you can get up and do anything, or shot off a cliff and the landing will kill you
author: kapxis
